nodes.text: Ripoblus forces used two Lambda-class T-4a shuttle from group Gamu during the Sepan Civil War. Imperial forces encountered shuttles Gamu as Dimok starships staged a raid on Ripolus supply convoy. Shuttles Gamu aided Imperial starfighters in pushing back the Dimok attackers. They were not much of a match for their Dimok opponents, so there may be chance that they were destroyed.
Gamu is a municipality in the Philippines.
